item.title: Nicolas-Jay Winemaker Dinner with Valley Commissary
item.description: Nicolas-Jay proprietors Jean-Nicolas Meo and Jay Boberg invite you into their Dundee home for an intimate winemaker dinner with pairings from Nicolas-Jay and Domaine Meo-Camuzet. 971-412-1124
